attributes.action: force Alan Johnson to apologise for the way he dealt with Professor Nutt and the lack of respect he has shown science and scientists in general and the good work they do in advising the government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alan Johnson has sacked a scientist for doing exactly what he was employed to do.  To give his professional opinion backed up with scientific evidence and advise the government to help enable them to set relative policy.  Professor Nutt should be praised for pointing out the flaws in the governments scaremongering policy on drugs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
